值.definition: value; (to be) worth; to happen to; to be on duty

值勤.definition: variant of 執勤|执勤[zhi2 qin2]

值守.definition: (of a security guard etc) to be on duty, keeping an eye on things; to keep watch

值得.definition: worth the money; to merit; to deserve; to be worth (doing sth)

值星.definition: (of army officers) to be on duty for the week

值此.definition: on this (occasion); at this time when ...; on this occasion

值班.definition: to work a shift; on duty

值遇.definition: to meet with; to bump into
